summary: Created page with "Lucy Richards is an American woman who was sentenced to five months in prison in 2017 for threatening the parent of a victim of [[The Sandy Hook Elementary Massacre]]<ref>https://www.nytimes.com/2016/12/07/us/florida-woman-is-charged-with-threatening-sandy-hook-parent.html</ref>. Richards had sent multiple death threats to the parent, accusing him of being an actor involved in a hoax.  Richards was a believer in the false conspiracy theory that the Sandy Hook shooting wa..."
